snippet: The advocate, Xu Zhiyong, helped organize demonstrations demanding that the Communist Party disclose officials’ wealth and provide equal educational opportunities.
abstract: Police in Beijing recommend that prominent human rights activist Xu Zhiyong be tried for his role in organizing demonstrations demanding that Communist Party disclose officials’ wealth and provide equal educational opportunities; recommendation brings Xu one step closer to trial, but prosecutors must still decide whether to indict him.
